attributes.action: boycott the Beijing Olympics and urge others to do so in protest against Chinese policy backing the genocidal Sudanese regime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chinese government has persistently blocked effective UN action against the Sudanese government's policy of genocide in Darfur. In response I believe that the British government should lead other western countries in boycotting the Beijing Olympics in protest. What matters more, winning some medals in China or saving women from rape and children from murder?
